testcase.name: Search in different languages
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "hello" in English........................................passed Then I should see relevant results for "hello"..............................passed When I search for "hola" in Spanish.........................................passed Then I should see relevant results for "hola"...............................passed When I search for "bonjour" in French.......................................passed Then I should see relevant results for "bonjour"............................passed

testcase.name: Verify case sensitivity in Google Search
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "TestCase"................................................passed Then I save the number of results...........................................passed When I search for "testcase"................................................passed Then the number of results should be similar to saved results...............passed

testcase.name: Display calculator service when searching for "calculator"
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "calculator"..............................................passed Then I should see the calculator service displayed..........................passed

testcase.name: Converter service appears at top when searching for conversion services
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "Google converter services"...............................passed Then the conversion service should appear at the top of search results......passed
